籤詩版本二:
Kada mai hali ya damu da kananan mutane, idan al'amura sun lalace, zai haifar da rikici.
Dole ne a saurari sautin piano tare da aboki na kud da kud da shi, koyaushe yana yin shiru da rashin fahimta, wannan aikin na kowa ne.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram ya kamata ya hadu da hoton aboki na kusa.
Tsayawa abubuwa akai zai kawo sa'a.
解曰:
Zhiyinfangxu. Kada ku kula da wasu abubuwa. Ka ɗauki kanka kamar mutum mai daraja. Duk farin ciki.
Zhiyin Fangxu yana da haruffa huɗu, waɗanda asalinsu aka rubuta su da Shiyin Fangua.
籤詩故事一:
◇BoYa ya ziyarci abokai (BoYa Broken Qin)
Boya, mai suna Yu, wanda aka ba wa suna Rui da kuma ladabi mai suna Boya, ɗan asalin garin Yingdu ne, na Jihar Chu a lokacin bazara da kaka da kuma lokacin Jihohin yaƙi.
Zhong Ziqi ya yi aiki a matsayin mai yankan itace a masarautar Chu. Wata rana, ya sadu da Yu Boya yana kaɗa garaya a cikin kogin Han, Zhong Ziqi ya ji wata murya tana cewa: "Ya yi tsayi kamar dutse, yana kuma girgiza kamar ruwa mai gudana." Bikin kaka na gaba shekara.
A shekara mai zuwa, Yu Boya ya kiyaye alƙawura kamar yadda aka tsara, amma Zhong Ziqi ya rasu. Bayan da Yu Boya ya ji cewa Zhong Ziqi ya mutu, Yu Boya ya yi tunanin cewa ba za a ƙara yin kaɗe-kaɗe a duniya ba, kuma ba zai ƙara buga garaya ba a rayuwarsa.
ce:
Karɓar Yao Qin da Feng Wei Han. Zi Qi bai damu da wanda yake yi wa wasa ba.
Iskar bazara ta kawo duk abokai. Yana da wuya a sami aboki na gaskiya.
聖意: Ka kiyayi fita daga gidanka da muguwarka, yayin neman arziki, ka kiyayi ciniki, yana da kyau a makara wajen yin aure, ba shi da kyau mata masu tafiya a kasa su motsa gonaki, tsutsotsin siliki da dabbobi, don neman mutane da himma. , don shigar da kara da yin hijira, don neman dukiyar da aka bata cikin sauri, cututtuka sun toshe su, da kaburbura a cikin tsaunuka.
古人: Boya Ya Ziyarci Abokai (Boya Broken Qin)
